house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1979 has 6 bedroom(s), 6 bath(s) , 4 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace, skylights.
house_listing.firm_name: Coldwell Banker Success Realty Coldwell Banker Success Realty
